sense.gloss: resident in Japan (of a foreigner), situated in Japan (e.g. of an embassy)
Zainichi, Zainichi Korean, North or South Korean national with permanent residency in Japan (who came to the country before 1945, or a descendant of such a person)

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑無罪↑↓む|ざい↓にち|がいない。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑無罪↑↓む|ざい↓にち|がいない。
sdata.e: There's no doubt that he's innocent.
